title: Stock Futures Waver Ahead of Inflation Data
sub_head: The U.S. consumer-price index for May is due at 8:30 a.m. ET
body:
U.S. stock futures wavered as investors awaited the last major inflation reading before the Federal Reserve’s meeting next week.
Futures for the S&P 500 slipped 0.2% Friday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 were flat and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average ticked down 0.2%. U.S. stock benchmarks posted their biggest declines in more than three weeks on Thursday, leaving indexes on course to end the week with losses.
